name: Main ciaorentcar workflow

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  tests:
    name: Run tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    services:
      postgres:
        image: postgres:13.10
        env:
          POSTGRES_USER: ciaorentcar_user
          POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ciaorentcar_password
          POSTGRES_DB: ciaorentcar
        ports:
          - "5432:5432"
        options: >-
          --health-cmd pg_isready
          --health-interval 10s
          --health-timeout 5s
          --health-retries 5

      redis:
        image: redis:7
        ports:
          - "6379:6379"
        options: >-
          --health-cmd "redis-cli ping"
          --health-interval 10s
          --health-timeout 5s
          --health-retries 5

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Install OS deps for cairo
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y libcairo2-dev pkg-config python3-dev libffi-dev

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.9"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install flake8==6.0.0 flake8-isort==6.0.0
          pip install -r ./backend/requirements.txt

      - name: Django tests
        env:
          POSTGRES_USER: ciaorentcar_user
          POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ciaorentcar_password
          POSTGRES_DB: ciaorentcar
          DB_HOST: 127.0.0.1
          DB_PORT: 5432
        run: |
          cd backend/
          python manage.py makemigrations core --check
          python manage.py migrate
          python manage.py test

  build:
    name: Cleanup runner docker cache
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: tests
    steps:
      - name: Prune old Docker images
        run: |
          sudo docker system prune -f --all

  build_and_push_to_docker_hub:
    name: Push backend Docker image to DockerHub
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: tests

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: Login to DockerHub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN_RW }}

      - name: Build and push backend
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v6
        with:
          context: ./backend/
          push: true
          tags: egorovdocker/ciaorentcar_backend:latest

  build_gateway_and_push_to_docker_hub:
    name: Push gateway Docker image to DockerHub
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: Login to DockerHub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN_RW }}

      - name: Build and push gateway
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v6
        with:
          context: ./gateway/
          push: true
          tags: egorovdocker/ciaorentcar_gateway:latest

  deploy:
    name: Deploy to server
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs:
      - build_and_push_to_docker_hub
      - build_gateway_and_push_to_docker_hub

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Copy docker-compose.production.yml via SCP
        uses: appleboy/scp-action@master
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_KEY }}
          passphrase: ${{ secrets.SSH_PASSPHRASE }}
          source: docker-compose.production.yml
          target: ciaorentcar

      - name: Deploy over SSH
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_KEY }}
          passphrase: ${{ secrets.SSH_PASSPHRASE }}
          script: |
            set -e

            cd ciaorentcar

            echo "${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN_RO }}" | sudo docker login -u "${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}" --password-stdin

            sudo docker system prune -f
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml pull

            echo "üîÑ Ensuring database is running..."
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up -d db redis

            echo "‚è≥ Waiting for services to start..."
            sleep 30

            echo "üîÑ Restarting application services..."
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up -d backend gateway

            echo "üìã Current status of services:"
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml ps

            echo "üßπ Safe cleanup (preserving data)..."
            sudo docker container prune -f
            sudo docker image prune -f
            echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è Redis cleanup skipped - automatic cleanup is configured with maxmemory-policy"

            echo "üîÑ Running all migrations..."
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml exec backend python manage.py migrate

            echo "üåç Compiling messages..."
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml exec backend python manage.py compilemessages

            echo "üìÅ Collecting static files..."
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml exec backend python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --clear

            echo "üîç Checking service health..."
            for i in {1..12}; do
              if sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml ps --filter "health=healthy" | grep -q "healthy"; then
                echo "‚úÖ Services are healthy"
                break
              fi
              echo "‚è≥ Waiting for services to become healthy... ($i/12)"
              sleep 10
            done

            echo "‚úÖ Deployment completed! Final status:"
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml ps

            echo "üìã Recent backend logs:"
            sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml logs --tail=20 backend

  send_message:
    name: Notify via Telegram
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: deploy

    steps:
      - name: Send Telegram message
        uses: appleboy/telegram-action@master
        with:

          token: ${{ secrets.TELEGRAM_TOKEN }}
          message: |

            ‚úÖ –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω—ã
